The claim is related to the state of Ohi: 2. The claim was made by Rep. Bill Johnson during a telephone town hall and is being used as a campaign issue in the rematch between Johnson and Charlie Wilson.
PolitiFact Ohio was interested in verify: 4. PolitiFact Ohio previously rated a similar statement by Gov. John Kasich about Ohio being the No. 1 job creator in America as True, but they decided to recheck the numbers to see if Johnson's claim still holds up.
